alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Pontotoc; Union (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 16 at 2:28AM CDT until April 16 at 3:15AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Lafayette County in northwestern Mississippi... Northern Pontotoc County in northeastern Mississippi... Southern Union County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 315 AM CDT. * At 227 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Pinedale, or 12 miles southwest of New Albany, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... New Albany, Pontotoc, Trace State Park, Ecru, New Harmony, Etta, Furrs, Pinedale, Sherman, Thaxton, Blue Springs, Hortontown, Poolville, Esperanza, Endville, Cherry Creek, Ellistown, Rough Edge, Nixon and Union Hill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
